title: (x) PowerBook G4 keyboard font - Univers Cd Lt It {Matthijs}
content: so what is the font used on apple keyboard?
author: designalchemy

comments.content:
The one I have is this rediculous narrow, slanted, stiff thing. What do you expect from a company that uses ITC Garamond (Light and Condensed, no less) for their logotype...   
   
hhp

hi mike,   
   
I don't know if this will help you, but I've got a keyboard from apple for the G4. (it'a a little compact keyboard) The font what's been used for the typography of this keyboard has a great resemblance of the 'Univers Condensed Italic Light', according Berthold entitled no '48' (you know the Univers got a system of numbers)   
   
The difference is that the typeface of the keyboard is slightly less slanted than the original Univers. The numbers and capitals are almost exactly the same, the $, ยง also. The & is different, but I think apple made a few corrections to the typeface. It's probably used exclusively by Apple.   
   
But I don't know of your keyboard-type looks like the desktop-keyboard from the G4, but there might be a great change.   
   
Otherwise, when I'm wrong, please try to upload a picture from the keys   
   
good luck   
   
M
